mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Food (ID, FOODNAME, FOODAMOUNT, FOODPRICE, FOODTEL, FOODADDRESS, FOODGIVER, FOODIMAGE, FOODUPLOADTIME, CONTEXT, COOKINGTIME, DEADLINE) VALUES (#{id}, #{foodName}, #{foodAmount}, #{foodPrice}, #{foodTel}, #{foodAddress}, #{foodGiver}, #{foodImage}, NOW(), #{context}, #{cookingTime}, #{deadline})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, FOODNAME, FOODAMOUNT, FOODPRICE, FOODTEL, FOODADDRESS, FOODGIVER, FOODIMAGE, FOODUPLOADTIME, CONTEXT, COOKINGTIME, DEADLINE FROM Food
mapper.update: UPDATE Food SET FOODNAME=#{foodName}, FOODAMONUT=#{foodAmount}, FOODPRICE=#{foodPrice}, FOODIMAGE=#{foodImage}, FOODUPLOADTIME=NOW(), CONTEXT=#{context}, COOKINGTIME=#{cookingTime}, DEADLINE=#{deadline} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Food WHERE ID=#{id} AND FOODNAME=#{foodName}
